p:
The presence data of
Heracleum sosnowskyi
occurrences were obtained as a random sample of GBIF dataset described in this article. Five hundred randomly chosen presence points were taken for modelling at Plot 1 and 1000 points for modelling at Plot 2. Furthermore, 500 (for Plot 1) and 1000 (for Plot 2) randomly distributed points were used as a background point.
